reviewText: I first saw this sometime in the mid 70s. In this special, our amigo de gordo and his pals try to stop Rudy and a fellow trickster from bothering the old folks in the neighborhood on halloween. Trust me, it's better thna the current film.
I thought it was good but it took more then half the movie to get to the action and the real horror of it. Other than that, it was a great movie, if you haven't seen it, your missing out!

This movie is the classic, and the classics live on forever.  A truly great movie.  All of the Halloween movies were great but this will always be the best.  If you are in for the scare af your life this is the movie  for you.

I've seen Halloween so many times I can't even put a number on it. I've never seen a movie that caught my attention right from the beginning credits! That music....keeps lingering on your mind all movie long. Every  Halloween I put the movie on our big screen TV, right at the beginning and  turn off all the lights...even the trick-or-treaters get scared and they  said they never saw the movie! If you like horror films you've got to see  this classic. You won't be disappointed!
